name: Intermatic-Home-Skill
0:
”Alexa, turn off my outdoor lights”
”Alexa, turn on my outdoor lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the Intermatic – Smart Home Skill and Alexa, you have the ability to command your Intermatic Smart timers using voice commands. To get started, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button in the Alexa App to link your Intermatic Connect account and to discover your device(s). Find more information about connecting Smart Home devices at https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=G3RKPNRKF33ECTW7.

After enabling the Intermatic Smart Home skill, make sure that you have given your Intermatic Smart Timer a name that is easy to say. This skill will allow you to turn ON/OFF your Intermatic Smart Timer.

Common phrases to interact with Alexa:

Phrase: Alexa, turn off my outdoor lights
Phrase: Alexa, turn on my outdoor lights.
